intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects to know whether the TV located by the credenza, specifically the Samsung The Frame (49 inches), is currently powered on.  
Constraints & cues: The command is directed at the Samsung The Frame TV, which is confirmed to be on, with a volume level of 6 and not muted.
